instructions: Trim and slice chicken breasts thin.@In a large ziplock bag, combine 3 Tbs olive oil, salt, pepper, lime juice, garlic powder, chili powder, cumin, and cilantro. Mix well.@Add chicken to bag and marinate at room temperature for 1 hour.@Remove chicken from marinade and pat dry. Heat olive oil in a large frying pan on high heat and brown 3-4 minutes on each side. Remove chicken to a plate and let cool.@In the same pain, add another Tbs of olive oil and sautee peppers and onions for 3-4 minutes.@Slice chicken breast and combine with peppers and onions. Serve on warm tortillas.
